enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: On Friday, 25 October, LDC Expert Group (LEG) Chair Bubu Jallow (Gambia) reported on the second meeting of the Group and on progress in implementing the LEG work programme.
He highlighted a workshop held in Dhaka that aimed to develop NAPAs.
He noted that the Group had decided against revising NAPA guidelines at COP-8, preferring to do this at COP-9. On Tuesday, 29 October, SBI approved a draft decision on matters related to LDCs.
